title: Breakingviews TV: Trump & trade
text:
Breakingviews TV: Trump & trade 4:13pm BST - 05:51 
The U.S. president may be warming to multilateralism, suggesting he’s open to joining the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade pact he once campaigned against. Pete Sweeney and Chris Beddor talk about whether this is a move toward cooling down or heating up the trade war with China.   
The U.S. president may be warming to multilateralism, suggesting he’s open to joining the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade pact he once campaigned against. Pete Sweeney and Chris Beddor talk about whether this is a move toward cooling down or heating up the trade war with China.  //reut.rs/2IOqAqQ
